name: Escape Art !
description:
You are a Robot and managed to escape the in the way from diferent obstacles, but there is still a long way to go before your escape is complete.
Run through all worlds before obstacles catch upon you. You will find many obstacles in your way and the path is very difficult.

EscapeArt is a challenging Landscape one-touch game with unique style. Touch the screen to run the robot moving forward, avoid obstacles, and try to escape.

Can you save all the yourself and manage to escape?
